author: CBC News
title: 'Your whole life is spent caring': Clinicians over 60 stay on the job during pandemic despite the greater risk
description: More than one-third of Canada's COVID-19 cases are people 60 and over. Many doctors and nurses are in that age group, which has experts considering about how best to protect them during the coronavirus outbreak, including the use of virtual care and other inn…
